devdoc.author: Marco Godoy (Eth Kipu comisiÃ³n 3)
devdoc.details: This contract allows users to: - Add liquidity to the pool - Remove liquidity from the pool - Swap between TokenA and TokenB - Retrieve prices and reserves

params.amountA: The amount of TokenA to deposit.
params.amountB: The amount of TokenB to deposit.

returns.reserveA: The amount of TokenA in the pool.
returns.reserveB: The amount of TokenB in the pool.

params.amountA: The amount of TokenA to withdraw.
params.amountB: The amount of TokenB to withdraw.

params.amountAIn: The amount of TokenA to exchange.

params.amountBIn: The amount of TokenB to exchange.

devdoc.title: SimpleDEX

addLiquidity(uint256,uint256).notice: Allows owner to add liquidity to the pool.

constructor.notice: Initializes the contract with token addresses and sets the owner.

getPriceA().notice: Retrieves the current price of TokenA in terms of TokenB.

getPriceB().notice: Retrieves the current price of TokenB in terms of TokenA.

getReserves().notice: Retrieves the current reserves of TokenA and TokenB in the liquidity pool.

removeLiquidity(uint256,uint256).notice: Allows owner to remove liquidity from the pool.

swapAforB(uint256).notice: Allows users to swap TokenA for TokenB.

swapBforA(uint256).notice: Allows users to swap TokenB for TokenA.

userdoc.notice: A smart contract that serves as a decentralized exchange for educational purposes.
